pages.text: Factories are not only capable of creating parasites, as Vagrants can also give them certain items in exchange for other ones.
As for what items can be given, Vagrants are able to distinguish what a Factory can transmute and what it can't, although the exact way they do this is unknown.
This does not, however, extend to what the trade will produce. In fact, when left to their own devices, some Vagrants will attempt to test items they find to see what they can make.
Most trades tend to revolve around converting Biome tissue into useable blocks and resources and vice versa.

$(#630000)This one's easy, just use $(k:use) on the Factory with the desired input in hand. Some trades may require a bit of biomass, or a certain Tier of Factory to be performed. Crouching can trade a whole stack of items.
